oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gesture recognition using position and appearance features
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: AGRAWAL, T
CHAUDHURI, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper a scheme for recognizing hand gestures is presented using the output of a Condensation tracker. The tracker is used to obtain a set of features. These features consisting of temporal evolution of the spatial moments form high dimensional feature vectors. The principal components of the feature trajectories are used to recognize the gestures.
